article_title: Rise in crowdfunding lets patients seek help for medical treatment
article_text:
More are raising money online to pay for expensive, experimental treatments

About 1,600 families in Sacramento area are using GoFundMe website to raise money

For some, trying an experimental treatment seems only chance to extend life

article_metadata.description: When Esperanza Hannon was denied entrance to a clinical trial in June, it was another dashed hope in many attempts to find treatment for her fast-spreading breast cancer.
article_metadata.title: Rise in crowdfunding lets patients seek help for medical treatment | The Sacramento Bee
